00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_H
00012 
00013 
00014 #include "numclass.H"
00015 
00016 //  matrix<D>: a DxD matrix
00017 template <unsigned D> class matrix {
00018 public:
00019   matrix<D> ();
00020   matrix<D> (double, double, double, double, double, double);
00021   matrix<D> (unsigned, unsigned, double);
00022   virtual ~matrix<D> () { }
00023 
00024   double &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00025     return M[i][j]; }
00026 
00027   matrix<D> operator * (const matrix<D> &) const;
00028   Vector operator * (const Vector &);
00029 
00030   matrix<D> operator - ();
00031 
00032   string Print ();
00033 
00034 protected:
00035   double M[D][D];
00036 };
00037 
00038 
00039 /*******************************************************************************
00040  *  default constructor: creates a unity DxD matrix
00041  */
00042 template<unsigned D> matrix<D>::matrix<D> () {
00043   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                    //  i: row
00044     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                //  j: col
00045       M[i][j] = 0;
00046     M[i][i] = 1;
00047   }
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 /*******************************************************************************
00052  *  creates a DxD rotation matrix, where D=4, nyi
00053  *  @param Rxy  rotation around xy plane (z axis)
00054  *  @param Rxz  rotation around xz plane (y axis)
00055  *  @param Rxw  rotation around xw plane
00056  *  @param Ryz  rotation around xy plane (x axis)
00057  *  @param Ryw  rotation around yw plane
00058  *  @param Rzw  rotation around zw plane
00059  */
00060 template <unsigned D> matrix<D>::matrix<D> (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw, double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw) {
00061   cerr << "matrix<" << D <<">::matrix<" << D <<"> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw) not yet implemented!" << endl;
00062   abort();
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 /*******************************************************************************
00067  *  creates a rotation about axes ii and jj of angle Theta
00068  *  @param ii       first (row) index
00069  *  @param jj       second (column) index
00070  *  @param Theta    rotation angle
00071  */
00072 template<unsigned D> matrix<D>::matrix<D> (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, double Theta) {
00073   double c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00074   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                    //  i: row
00075     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                //  j: col
00076       M[i][j] = 0;
00077     M[i][i] = 1;
00078   }
00079   M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00080   M[ii][jj] = -s;
00081   M[jj][ii] = s;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 /*******************************************************************************
00086  *  matrix multiplication
00087  *  @param B    matrix to multiply with
00088  *  @return *this * B
00089  */
00090 template <unsigned D> matrix<D> matrix<D>::operator * (const matrix<D> &B) const {
00091   matrix<D> C;
00092   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                  //  i: row
00093     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {              //  j: col
00094       double s = 0;
00095       for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00096     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00097       C.M[i][j] = s;
00098     }
00099   return C;
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 /*******************************************************************************
00104  *  apply the matrix on a vector
00105  *  @param V    Vector to multiply with (project)
00106  *  @return *this * V
00107  */
00108 template <unsigned D> Vector matrix<D>::operator * (const Vector &V) {
00109   if (D != V.dimension ()) {
00110     cerr << "Vector matrix<" << D << ">::operator * (const Vector &V)" << endl
00111      << "matrix.D != Vector.D:\n" << D << " != " << V.dimension () << endl;
00112     abort();
00113   }
00114 
00115   Vector W (D);
00116   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                //  i: row
00117     double s = 0;
00118     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)            //  j: col
00119       s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00120     W[i] = s;
00121   }
00122   return W;
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 /*******************************************************************************
00127  *  matrix negation
00128  *  @return - *this
00129  */
00130 template <unsigned D> matrix<D> matrix<D>::operator - () {
00131   matrix<D> B (*this);
00132   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                  //  i: row
00133     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {              //  j: col
00134       B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00135     }
00136   return B;
00137 }

00139 #include <sstream>
00140 #include <iomanip>
00141 
00142 
00143 /*******************************************************************************
00144  *  output, mainly for debugging purposes
00145  */
00146 template <unsigned D> string matrix<D>::Print () {
00147   ostringstream o;
00148   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00149     o << "|";
00150     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) 
00151       o << setw (10) << setprecision (3) << M[i][j];
00152     o << "|\n";
00153   }
00154   o << ends;
00155   return o.str ();
00156 }
